item.help: The Dropbox app ID which you use to initiate the [Dropbox JavaScript]. Example : m0inwezext0cz5s This ID have to be same for all instances of the widgets within same Edge phase .
item.name: APP_KEY

item.help: URL of the file the Saver should add to the user's Dropbox. The Saver supports HTTP and HTTPS URIs.
item.name: SAVER_URL

item.help: User-friendly name of the file that should be saved to the user's Dropbox can be included if desired.
item.name: FILE_NAME

item.help: The Dropbox app ID which you use to initiate the [Dropbox JavaScript]. Example : m0inwezext0cz5s This ID have to be same for all instances of the widgets within same Edge phase .
item.name: APP_KEY
